name: Hibernating Hedgehogs
description:
Hibernating Hedgehogs is a 3d take on the classic Minesweeper.

Complete each level in the fastest times to unlock stars to progress to the next level.

Don't forget, if you disturb the hedgehogs, you lose!

Controls:

WASD + Mouse

Left click to clear grass, right click to place a flag.

Happy gardening.
